entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
